content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base') IS NOT NULL  
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base
AS

SELECT [name], supername, [description], species, ranking,
    aliases, authors, images, partners, powers,
    secretIdentities, teams, urls
FROM stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
    WITH (
        aliases NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.aliases' AS JSON,
        authors NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.authors' AS JSON,
        description VARCHAR(256),
        images NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.images' AS JSON,
        name VARCHAR(256),
        partners NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.partners' AS JSON,
        powers NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.powers' AS JSON,
        ranking NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.ranking' AS JSON,
        secretIdentities NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.secretIdentities' AS JSON,
        species NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.species' AS JSON,
        superName VARCHAR(256),
        teams NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.teams' AS JSON,
        urls NVARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS'$.urls' AS JSON
    ) AS marvel_hero 

GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_species') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_species
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_species 
AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS species 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb 
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.species) 
  WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS '$') AS jCol
  
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_ranking') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_ranking
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_ranking AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[key] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AS RankType,
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS RankValue
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.ranking) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_aliases'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_aliases
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_aliases AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS aliases 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.aliases) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_authors'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_authors
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_authors AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS authors 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.authors) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_images') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_images
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_images AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[key] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AS ImageType,
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS ImageURL
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.images)  AS jCol
WHERE jCol.[value] IS NOT NULL
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_partners'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_partners
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_partners AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS partners 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.partners) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_powers') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_powers
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_powers AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS powers 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.powers) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_secretIdentities'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_secretIdentities
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_secretIdentities AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS secretIdentities 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.secretIdentities) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_teams') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_teams
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_teams AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS teams 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.teams) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_urls') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_urls
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_urls AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[key] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AS URL_Source,
  jCol.[value] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS  AS URL
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb 
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.urls) AS jCol 
GO
